title: BONUS 3 - Hitler's Third Reich: How Did It Happen?
description: How did Hitler and his Nazi Party ever gain political power in 1930s Germany? Why didn't the German people revolt? Why didn't America or any other countries intervene? How did the Jewish persecution begin? The foundation for Hitler and WWII examined and explained on this bonus episode of Timesuck!
author: dan@dancummins.tv (Dan Cummins)
